attributes.action: stop the three week bin collection before they start
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the British public do not want fortnightly collections yet the current government are planning to have collections after three weeks. this is wrong and unfair and must be stopped now.

rejection.details: Bin collection is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
